TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TrackingServices extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供註冊、移除註冊和取得追蹤處理常式清單的方式。

span.span: Provides a way to register, unregister, and obtain a list of tracking handlers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 追蹤處理常式已實作的物件介面，表示遠端執行功能基礎結構封送處理、 解封送處理，或中斷連線的物件或 proxy 時，必須通知他們。Tracking handlers are objects that implement the interface, indicating that they must be notified whenever the remoting infrastructure marshals, unmarshals, or disconnects an object or proxy. 已註冊的每個物件物件或在目前的 proxy 時，會將遠端處理呼叫封送處理、 marshaling，或已中斷連線。Every object that is registered with is called by remoting when an object or proxy in the current is marshaled, unmarshaled, or disconnected. 中的所有方法類別是靜態的而且在目前的追蹤處理常式操作。All methods in the class are static and operate on the tracking handlers in the current . > [!NOTE] > 此類別可讓連結要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果立即呼叫者沒有基礎結構的權限，則會擲回安全性例外狀況。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法的登錄和取消登錄的追蹤處理常式的類別。The following code example shows how to use the methods of the class to register and unregister tracking handlers. 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作追蹤處理常式。The following code example shows how to implement a tracking handler. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/trackinghandler.cs#30)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個類別，在伺服器上。The following code example shows how to implement this class on a server. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/server.cs#20)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作這個類別，如上述程式碼範例中的伺服器在用戶端上。The following code example shows how to implement this class on a client for the server in the preceding code example. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/client.cs#0)] 下列程式碼範例示範使用伺服器和用戶端的遠端物件。The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the server and the client. [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Services.TrackingServices/CS/remoteservice.cs#10)]

permission.span: 營運與基礎結構程式碼。
